name: Obsidian Mermaid.js Helper (OMH)
description: Commands: < Clean code: it extrapolates the variable declarations and bring them to the top of the selection (only for 'flowchart' and 'graph') > , < Regex for style: use regex in the place of the id to select nodes in a 'style' or 'class' clause >, < Create files: Create a list of file in the active folder based on lines of the selection >
author: Francesco Di Cursi
